ygData.subject: RE: Instruments vs. Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You know, now that you mention it, there s a wandering bard in Qeynos whom I right clicked on on a lark, and I got the skill training selection screen.  I
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Sep 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> one? I am also including a spoiler for this skill at the end of this
> message because you can only train for it in ONE place in all of Norrath and
> I found the place. Here is MY story about Instill Doubt:

You know, now that you mention it, there's a wandering bard in
Qeynos whom I right clicked on on a lark, and I got the skill
training selection screen. I probably should've checked to
see if there were any "secret" skills on that list.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
